title: Candlestick, 19th century
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Four-lobed foot with gadrooned C-scrolls and collar. Four-lobed column, fluted in lower part, with gadrooned collar. Urn-shaped candle holder with gadrooned four-lobed rim. Weighted.

tombstone.epitaph:
Candlestick, 19th century.
19th century. Copper, silver plate. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-64-41-a.
